analysis.description: ONYXToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x46bf185867dc7e39ebfb9796a63b9be8a7caeed9.sol#313-319) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x46bf185867dc7e39ebfb9796a63b9be8a7caeed9.sol:
	Contract ONYXToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x46bf185867dc7e39ebfb9796a63b9be8a7caeed9.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ONYXToken.claimToken (/unique_contracts/0x46bf185867dc7e39ebfb9796a63b9be8a7caeed9.sol#289-293) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_contracts/0x46bf185867dc7e39ebfb9796a63b9be8a7caeed9.sol#292)

ONYXToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x46bf185867dc7e39ebfb9796a63b9be8a7caeed9.sol#313-319)
	- /unique_contracts/0x46bf185867dc7e39ebfb9796a63b9be8a7caeed9.sol#318-319
